summary: The diff implements the new post-purchase confirmation screen and wires routing/navigation to it as requested. No explicit requirement gaps are evident from the provided diff summary. There are a couple of extra (non-requested) metadata/documentation changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project metadata tracking new feature requests (project_state.json), which was not requested as part of the frontend routing/screen change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a new confirmation screen and routing/navigation updates; it does not mention maintaining a project state file.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified a documentation/summary file describing many UI/features (e.g., header branding changes, footer social links, admin settings tab), which are not part of the requested purchase confirmation screen/routing changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: These described changes are outside REQ-1/REQ-2 scope; the diff evidence shows the summary file content being updated beyond the requested functionality.
